name: Thai Salsa
recipeCategory: easy, weekday, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: dairy-free, low calorie, low-fat, vegan, vegetarian, fresh herbs, ginger, lime juice, mango
recipeIngredient: 1 large green, unripe or mango, about 1 1/4 pounds, peeled and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put all of the ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Season to taste. This dip can be stored in the refrigerator in a closed container for up to 2 days. Serve with nuggets of chicken, steamed scallop kebabs or shrimp.
